QuestData.Title: Set Us Up the Bomb
QuestData.Description: I'm definitely on to something here!$b$bI have enough volatile elements salvaged from our arsenal to make the explosives Goggath wants, but I need to stabilize it and pack it into bombs.$b$bWhat I need is some clay - and not just any clay... moon-kissed clay.$b$bIt's only found on the northern banks of Astranaar Lake, and it possesses the qualities I need to bring out the full potential of my discovery!
QuestData.LogDescription: Tweedle at Hellscream's Watch wants you to collect 10 samples of Moon-Kissed Clay.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's see what you've brought me, $r.
QuestData.RewardText: This is PERFECT!$b$bOh, just wait 'til you see what I can do with this....
